name: Rumor Quest (WIP)
description:
Rumor Quest is a RPG where you play as a team of paranormal investigators sent to solve mysterious cases stemmed from rumors being circulated. In this game, you will have to explore locations to find clues while having to encounter the paranormal elements that were a product of the rumors. 

Please fill in the feedback form for the Rumor Quest Battle System: https://forms.gle/2nvnNw52SZHFtAva8
